short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension adding Best House Search search engine to browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change default search engine to make Best House Search your search in Chrome browser address bar (omnibox).
To get a new search experience, you only need to install this extension and leave it as the default search in the address bar.

Privacy Policy: https://besthouseclub.com/privacy.html
Terms of Use: https://besthouseclub.com/terms.html

By clicking «Add to Chrome», I accept and agree to installing the Best House Search and setting Chrome search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
